example.name: passive, arg1 and arg2
example.text: Beyond that misty gray of the rain , he saw [the stretching hutment]-1, lowdiminutive log cabins , chinked *trace*-1 with mud , with doorways [0] aman would have [*-2] to crouch [*] to get through [*T*-1] , with roofs of tenting laid[*] over boughs or boards from hardtack boxes , or fence rails , with crankychimneys of sticks and dried mud .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'chink' based on sentences in BROWN. Comparison to 'fill'. No relevant VN entry.
